Your_progress_in:
Your progress is a sum accumulated through your wager 
 on both our casino and sportsbook. 
 Increasing through the tiers entitles you to bigger rewards and benefits.
All_bets:
All bets settled on the sportsbook return a 3x 
 (three times) faster rate of progression. 
 Voided bets are excluded.
In_order_to_move:
In order to move to the next level and get the 
 next rank, you need to have a wagered amount 
 more than indicated in the "Wager Amount".
